name: One Last Word
description:
A short game for the GMTK Jam 2019. 

What will you do if you have only one word left to say?

In this game you have ONE word to say, will you help someone? will declare your love? Choose wisely because one the word is said the game is over and you'll be unable to say anything else.

Your word will be shared with other players during the first playtrought.

Have fun, and choose your word carefully =)
